member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.Scale(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Auto scale image by width or height till longest border (width/height) is equal to new width/height. Final image aspect ratio is equal to original image aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of new w/h != aspect ratio of original image then one border will be in different size than the given value in order to keep original aspect ratio

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.Scale(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32,System.Int32,LazZiya.ImageResize.GraphicOptions)
member.summary: Auto scale image by width or height till longest border (width/height) is equal to new width/height. Final image aspect ratio is equal to original image aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of new w/h != aspect ratio of original image then one border will be in different size than the given value in order to keep original aspect ratio

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.ScaleByWidth(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scale image by width and keep same aspect ratio of target image same as the original image. Height will be adjusted automatically

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.GifScaleByWidth(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32,LazZiya.ImageResize.GraphicOptions)
member.summary: Scale image by width and keep same aspect ratio of target image same as the original image. Height will be adjusted automatically

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.ScaleByHeight(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32)
member.summary: Scale image by height and keep same aspect ratio of target image same as the original image. Width will be adjusted automatically

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.ScaleByHeight(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32,LazZiya.ImageResize.GraphicOptions)
member.summary: Scale image by height and keep same aspect ratio of target image same as the original image. Width will be adjusted automatically

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.ScaleAndCrop(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32,System.Int32,LazZiya.ImageResize.TargetSpot)
member.summary: Scale target image till shortest border are equal to target value, then crop the additonal pixels from the longest border. Final image aspect ratio is equal to the given new width/height

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.ScaleAndCrop(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32,System.Int32,LazZiya.ImageResize.GraphicOptions,LazZiya.ImageResize.TargetSpot)
member.summary: Scale target image till shortest border are equal to target value, then crop the additonal pixels from the longest border. Final image aspect ratio is equal to the given new width/height

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifResize.Crop(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Int32,System.Int32,LazZiya.ImageResize.TargetSpot)
member.summary: Directly crop original image without scaling it. Final image aspect ratio is equal to given new width/height
member.param: target spot to crop and save

member.summary: Directly crop original image without scaling it. Final image aspect ratio is equal to given new width/height
member.param: target spot to crop and save

member.summary: Draw image watermark

member.summary: Draw image watermark

member.summary: Draw image watermark

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGifWaterMark.AddImageWatermark(LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.AnimatedGif,System.Drawing.Image,LazZiya.ImageResize.ImageWatermarkOptions)
member.summary:
Draw image watermark.
Notice regarding watermark opacity:
If watermark image needs to be resized, first resize the watermark image, then save it to the disc, and read it again with Image.FromFile.

member.name: T:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.GifEncoder
member.summary:
Encodes multiple images as an animated gif to a stream.
ALWAYS ALWAYS ALWAYS wire this up in a using block
Disposing the encoder will complete the file.
Uses default .net GIF encoding and adds animation headers.

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.GifEncoder.#ctor(System.IO.Stream,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary:
Encodes multiple images as an animated gif to a stream.
ALWAYS ALWAYS ALWAYS wire this in a using block
Disposing the encoder will complete the file.
Uses default .net GIF encoding and adds animation headers.
member.param: The stream that will be written to.
Sets the width for this gif or null to use the first frame's width.
Sets the height for this gif or null to use the first frame's height.

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.GifEncoder.AddFrame(System.Drawing.Image,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Adds a frame to this animation.
member.param: The positioning x offset this image should be displayed at.
The positioning y offset this image should be displayed at.

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.Animated.GifEncoder.Dispose
member.summary: Save and dispose

member.summary:
Draw image watermark.
Notice regarding watermark opacity:
If watermark image needs to be resized, first resize the watermark image, then save it to the disc, and read it again with Image.FromFile.
member.param: Optional: dispose watermar image after finishing. Default: true

member.name: T:LazZiya.ImageResize.ImageWatermarkOptions
member.summary: Define options for adding image watermark over the image, like margin, opacity, and location.

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.ImageWatermarkOptions.Margin
member.summary: Margin in pixels. Depends on watermark location. default value 10

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.ImageWatermarkOptions.Location
member.summary: The location to draw the image watermark. Choose from pre-defined 9 main locations (3 cols, 3 rows). Default value TargetSpot.TopRight. See

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.ImageWatermarkOptions.Opacity
member.summary: Set opacity value of the image watermark (0 - 100). Default value 100 full color.

member.summary: Get the height of the scaled image according to its given width

member.returns: Size result of the scaling calculation

member.name: M:LazZiya.ImageResize.ResizeMethods.Scale.AutoScale(System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.Size)
member.summary: Get new sizes of the image to resize, The scale calculation will fit the new size till both width and height are contianed, So the final image is not cropped and completely fits in the new size.

member.name: T:LazZiya.ImageResize.ResizeMethods.ScaleAndCrop
member.summary: scale down image size till one of width or height are equal to target image size extra pixels will be cropped out target image aspect ratio is equal to defined new size aspect ratio

member.summary: The source reading rectangle from the source image

member.summary: Save the image to the specified path then dispose the Image object.
member.param: Full path including file name and extension to save the image to

member.name: T:LazZiya.ImageResize.TargetSpot
member.summary:
Use target spot to specify the reading sport of the source image, if the cropped image is larger than the new image size then select the spot to crop.
The TargetSpot pre-defines 9 main spots in the image, 3 columns and 3 rows. it helps easily select which area to read from the image for resize and crop.

member.summary: Takes the top left area of the image

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.TextWatermarkOptions.TextColor
member.summary: Value for the text color. Use alpha channel to specify transparency (0 - 255). Set alpha to 0 to remove text color. Default value Color.FromArgb(255, Color.White) full color. See

member.summary: Font size in pixel. Default value 24

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.TextWatermarkOptions.FontStyle
member.summary: Font style. Default value FontStyle.Regular. See

member.summary: Font family. Default value "Arial"

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.TextWatermarkOptions.BGColor
member.summary: Value for the text background color. Use alpha channel to specify transparency (0 - 255). Set alpha to 0 to remove background. Default value Color.FromArgb(0, Color.White) no background. See

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.TextWatermarkOptions.Margin
member.summary: Top/Bottom margin in pixels. Depends on watermark horizontal alignment. Default value 10

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.TextWatermarkOptions.Location
member.summary: The location to draw the text watermark. Choose from pre-defined 9 main locations (3 cols, 3 rows). Default value TargetSpot.BottomLeft. See

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.TextWatermarkOptions.OutlineColor
member.summary: Value for the text outline color. Use alpha channel to specify transparency (0 - 255). Set alpha to 0 to remove outline. Default value Color.FromArgb(255, Color.Black) See

member.name: P:LazZiya.ImageResize.TextWatermarkOptions.OutlineWidth
member.summary: Text outline width in pixels. Default value 3.5f
